Original: It sounds like you're short on cash.
I recommend spending some time
[Color:5]gathering[Color:0], [Color:5]cutting[Color:0], and [Color:5]mining[Color:0].
[Page]
If you take the materials you get that
way to the Berund Atelier, they'll pay
more for those than monster parts.
[Page]
You could also collect [Color:5]food[Color:0] from your
skyship. Merchants in Tharsis pay
good money for that stuff.

Original: You know the large [Color:5]lake[Color:0] to the [Color:5]west[Color:0] of
the [Color:5]Scarlet Pillars[Color:0]? There's supposed
to be a wrecked skyship out there.
[Page]
They haven't found the crew yet.
If you want to help look, there's a
search request posted to the board.
[Page]
Me? No thanks... I don't want to see
a drowned body.
